title: Taylor Polynomial with Table part - c

content.question: Use the Lagrange error bound to show that the third-degree polynomial for h about x = 2 approximates h(1.9) with error less than 3 тип10-4.

frqParts.text: Use the Lagrange error bound to show that the third-degree polynomial for h about x = 2 approximates h(1.9) with error less than 3 тип10-4.

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
